thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 12 of 171
thread.title: Linda White

author: Linda White
title: Linda White
text:
We have used TrustedHousesitters four times so far and have been really happy with the sitters we used. All were trusting, tidy and caring and best of all looked after my dog with lots of love.
I don't fret when we leave as I know Franke will be taken care of as well as my property.
This has been the best club I have joined and now I don't have to stress if I need a holiday and sitter. It works for me.
Linda
